title: Bootstrap Input Groups
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Extending Inputs
Input groups allow you to attach text, icons, or buttons to the inputs.

### Structure
1. `.input-group`: Wrapper.
2. `.input-group-text`: The static text part (e.g., '@' or '$').
3. `.form-control`: The input.

Order determines placement (Prepend vs Append).

examples.code: @
examples.explanation: Combines them into a single visual unit.

exam_notes: Can include buttons using standard .btn classes.
summary: Input groups allow complex form designs like search bars and currency inputs.
